name: Pixiels
description:
Hi! My name is Franco and this is my Metroidvania-like project for my last year of University, it's being a long journey and I am really happy to show it to everyone. Hope you enjoy it.

Here, you would play as Melody, a fairy that just woke up and doesn't know anything, not even herself, help her out to find out what is going on in this 2D forest world.

Controlls:

Must Play with a PS4 controller (It is possible to play with other type of controllers but the buttons may be on a different position).

Left Joystick - Movement (Left to Right).

Jump - Cross.

Powers - Square, Circle and Triangle.

Interact - R2.

Shrink - L2.
